# The `ARMOverrideBypasses` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Post-process the DAG to create cluster edges between instrs that may be fused by the processor into a single operation. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::ARMOverrideBypasses</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

Post-process the DAG to create cluster edges between instrs that may be fused by the processor into a single operation.

Definition at line 27 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armlatencymutations-h">ARMLatencyMutations.h</a>.
